headline: Jim Cramer on Autodesk: “We’re Going to Stay Away From the Love Canal That is Enterprise Software”
summary: Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer put under a microscope. Responding to a caller’s query about the stock toward the end of the lightning round, Cramer said: “This is another one, look, this is enterprise software. No one wants to touch these companies. It doesn’t matter if it’s for architects. No […]
